title: JDBC Connection URLs of the Most Popular RDBMS
description: Need to connect to your RDBMS with JDBC and don’t have the JDBC connection URL or driver name at hand? No problem, just look up your RDBMS below:
author: lukaseder
byline: Published by lukaseder I made jOOQ View all posts by lukaseder
excerpt: Need to connect to your RDBMS with JDBC and don’t have the JDBC connection URL or driver name at hand? No problem, just look up your RDBMS below: // BigQuery driver = “com.simba.googleb…
text: Need to connect to your RDBMS with JDBC and don’t have the JDBC connection URL or driver name at hand? No problem, just look up your RDBMS below: // BigQuery driver = "com.simba.googlebigquery.jdbc42.Driver"; url = "jdbc:bigquery://https://www.googleapis.com/bigquery/v2:443;ProjectId=<project-id>;OAuthType=0;OAuthServiceAcctEmail=<service-account>;OAuthPvtKeyPath=path-to-key.json"; // CockroachDB driver = "org.postgresql.Driver"; url = "jdbc:postgresql://<host>/<database>"; // Db2 driver = "com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver"; url = "jdbc:db2://<host>:50000/<database>"; // Derby driver = "org.apache.derby.jdbc.EmbeddedDriver"; url = "jdbc:derby:<path-to-database>;create=true"; // DuckDB driver = "org.duckdb.DuckDBDriver"; url = "jdbc:duckdb:<path-to-database>"; // EXASOL driver = "com.exasol.jdbc.EXADriver"; url = "jdbc:exa:<host>:9563;schema=<default-schema>"; // Firebird driver = "org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBDriver"; url = "jdbc:firebirdsql:<host>:<path-to-database>"; // H2 driver = "org.h2.Driver"; url = "jdbc:h2:<path-to-database>"; // HANA driver = "com.sap.db.jdbc.Driver"; url = "jdbc:sap://<host>:39017"; // HSQLDB driver = "org.hsqldb.jdbcDriver"; url = "jdbc:hsqldb:file:<path-to-database>"; // Ignite driver = "org.apache.ignite.IgniteJdbcThinDriver"; url = "jdbc:ignite:thin://<host>"; // Informix driver = "com.informix.jdbc.IfxDriver"; url = "jdbc:informix-sqli://<host>:9088/<database>:INFORMIXSERVER=informix"; // Ingres driver = "com.ingres.jdbc.IngresDriver"; url = "jdbc:ingres://<host>:II7/<database>"; // MariaDB driver = "org.mariadb.jdbc.Driver"; url = "jdbc:mariadb://<host>/<default-schema>"; // MemSQL driver = "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver"; url = "jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1/<default-schema>"; // MySQL driver = "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver"; url = "jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1/<default-schema>"; // Oracle driver = "oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver"; url = "jdbc:oracle:thin:@<database>:1521/<SID>" // PostgreSQL driver = "org.postgresql.Driver"; url = "jdbc:postgresql://<host>/<database>"; // Redshift driver = "com.amazon.redshift.jdbc.Driver"; url = "jdbc:redshift://<cluster-id>.<region>.redshift.amazonaws.com:5439/<database>" // Snowflake driver = "net.snowflake.client.jdbc.SnowflakeDriver"; url = "jdbc:snowflake://<server>.<region>.snowflakecomputing.com:443/?db=<database>&schema=<schema>"; // SQLite driver = "org.sqlite.JDBC"; url = "jdbc:sqlite:<path-to-database>"; // SQL Server driver = "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver"; url = "jdbc:sqlserver://<host>:1433;databaseName=<database>"; // Sybase ASE driver = "com.sybase.jdbc4.jdbc.SybDriver"; url = "jdbc:sybase:Tds:<host>:5000/<database>"; // Sybase SQL Anywhere driver = "com.sybase.jdbc4.jdbc.SybDriver"; url = "jdbc:sybase:Tds:<host>:2638"; // Teradata driver = "com.teradata.jdbc.TeraDriver"; url = "jdbc:teradata://<host>/DATABASE=<database>,DBS_PORT=1025" // Trino driver = "io.trino.jdbc.TrinoDriver"; url = "jdbc:trino://<host>:8080/memory/default"; // Vertica driver = "com.vertica.jdbc.Driver"; url = "jdbc:vertica://<host>:5433/<database>"; // YugabyteDB driver = "com.yugabyte.Driver"; url = "jdbc:yugabytedb://<host>/<database>";
html:
Need to connect to your RDBMS with JDBC and don’t have the JDBC connection URL or driver name at hand? No problem, just look up your RDBMS below:

// BigQuery
driver = "com.simba.googlebigquery.jdbc42.Driver";
url = "jdbc:bigquery://https://www.googleapis.com/bigquery/v2:443;ProjectId=<project-id>;OAuthType=0;OAuthServiceAcctEmail=<service-account>;OAuthPvtKeyPath=path-to-key.json";

// CockroachDB
driver = "org.postgresql.Driver";
url = "jdbc:postgresql://<host>/<database>";

// Db2
driver = "com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver";
url = "jdbc:db2://<host>:50000/<database>";

// Derby
driver = "org.apache.derby.jdbc.EmbeddedDriver";
url = "jdbc:derby:<path-to-database>;create=true";

// DuckDB
driver = "org.duckdb.DuckDBDriver";
url = "jdbc:duckdb:<path-to-database>";

// EXASOL
driver = "com.exasol.jdbc.EXADriver";
url = "jdbc:exa:<host>:9563;schema=<default-schema>";

// Firebird
driver = "org.firebirdsql.jdbc.FBDriver";
url = "jdbc:firebirdsql:<host>:<path-to-database>";

// H2
driver = "org.h2.Driver";
url = "jdbc:h2:<path-to-database>";

// HANA
driver = "com.sap.db.jdbc.Driver";
url = "jdbc:sap://<host>:39017";

// HSQLDB
driver = "org.hsqldb.jdbcDriver";
url = "jdbc:hsqldb:file:<path-to-database>";

// Ignite
driver = "org.apache.ignite.IgniteJdbcThinDriver";
url = "jdbc:ignite:thin://<host>";

// Informix
driver = "com.informix.jdbc.IfxDriver";
url = "jdbc:informix-sqli://<host>:9088/<database>:INFORMIXSERVER=informix";

// Ingres
driver = "com.ingres.jdbc.IngresDriver";
url = "jdbc:ingres://<host>:II7/<database>";

// MariaDB
driver = "org.mariadb.jdbc.Driver";
url = "jdbc:mariadb://<host>/<default-schema>";

// MemSQL
driver = "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver";
url = "jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1/<default-schema>";

// MySQL
driver = "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver";
url = "jdbc:mysql://127.0.0.1/<default-schema>";

// Oracle
driver = "oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver";
url = "jdbc:oracle:thin:@<database>:1521/<SID>"

// PostgreSQL
driver = "org.postgresql.Driver";
url = "jdbc:postgresql://<host>/<database>";

// Redshift
driver = "com.amazon.redshift.jdbc.Driver";
url = "jdbc:redshift://<cluster-id>.<region>.redshift.amazonaws.com:5439/<database>"

// Snowflake
driver = "net.snowflake.client.jdbc.SnowflakeDriver";
url = "jdbc:snowflake://<server>.<region>.snowflakecomputing.com:443/?db=<database>&schema=<schema>";

// SQLite
driver = "org.sqlite.JDBC";
url = "jdbc:sqlite:<path-to-database>";

// SQL Server
driver = "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver";
url = "jdbc:sqlserver://<host>:1433;databaseName=<database>";

// Sybase ASE
driver = "com.sybase.jdbc4.jdbc.SybDriver";
url = "jdbc:sybase:Tds:<host>:5000/<database>";

// Sybase SQL Anywhere
driver = "com.sybase.jdbc4.jdbc.SybDriver";
url = "jdbc:sybase:Tds:<host>:2638";

// Teradata
driver = "com.teradata.jdbc.TeraDriver";
url = "jdbc:teradata://<host>/DATABASE=<database>,DBS_PORT=1025"

// Trino
driver = "io.trino.jdbc.TrinoDriver";
url = "jdbc:trino://<host>:8080/memory/default";

// Vertica
driver = "com.vertica.jdbc.Driver";
url = "jdbc:vertica://<host>:5433/<database>";

// YugabyteDB
driver = "com.yugabyte.Driver";
url = "jdbc:yugabytedb://<host>/<database>";
